instruction: Please analyze the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on the issuance and performance of U.S. asset-backed securities (ABS) in 2020 and provide insights into the factors that may shape consumer-ABS performance in the short and long term.
output: In 2020, the issuance of U.S. asset-backed securities declined by 25% compared to the previous year, with the greatest impact seen in ABS tied to credit cards, travel, entertainment, and retail. However, the performance of consumer ABS held up well due to the effectiveness of economic relief and borrower support programs. Looking ahead, the ability of borrowers to repay may depend on the continuation of these programs in the short term, while long-term performance may hinge on the pace of economic recovery post-pandemic. Overall, the outlook for consumer ABS is largely influenced by macroeconomic factors such as unemployment rates, consumer confidence, and government policy.
